languages.text: "Вил'Ирлиэт — порождение ереси, и все же ты ведешь себя так, будто близ{mf|ок|ка} с ней... Причудливое извращение — столь противоестественная терпимость... Не могу понять — происки ли это эльдарки или изъян твоей души?"

traits.locale_text: "Тай'Ирлиэт — порождение ереси, и все же ты близ{mf|ок|ка} с ней... я вижу причудливое извращение в связи ксеноса и слуги Неумирающего и не могу понять — происки ли это эльдарки или же изъян твоей души?"

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"
languages.original_text: "Вил'Ирлиэт — порождение ереси, и все же ты ведешь себя так, будто близ{mf|ок|ка} с ней... Причудливое извращение — столь противоестественная терпимость... Не могу понять — происки ли это эльдарки или изъян твоей души?"

traits.locale_text: "Tei'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you've grown close to her... This perversion borne of whim, this union of a xenos and the Undying One's servant... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

"Tei'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you've grown close to her... This perversion borne of whim, this union of a xenos and the Undying One's servant... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

"Tei'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you have grown close to her... This perversion borne of whim, this union of a xenos and a servant of the Undying One... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

"Tei'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you have grown close to her... This perversion borne of whim, this union of a xenos and a servant of the Undying One... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

"Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

"Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet ist ein Gezücht der Ketzerei, und doch handelt Ihr, als stündet Ihr und die Xenos Euch nahe ... Diese aus Leid geborene Perversion, diese unnatürliche Toleranz ... Ich verstehe es nicht ... ist das das Werk der Aeldari oder eine Schwäche Eurer eigenen Seele?"
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

traits.locale_text: "Vil'Yrliet ist ein Gezücht der Ketzerei, und doch handelt Ihr, als stündet Ihr und die Xenos Euch nahe ... Diese aus Leid geborene Perversion, diese unnatürliche Toleranz ... Ich verstehe es nicht ... ist das das Werk der Aeldari oder eine Schwäche Eurer eigenen Seele?"

languages.text: «Tei'Yrliet es un engendro herético, y, aun así, usted actúa como si tuviera cierta cercanía con los xenos... Esta perversión nacida del capricho, esta tolerancia fuera de lo normal... No lo entiendo. ¿Es obra de la Aeldari o es una falta de su propia alma?».
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

traits.locale_text: «Tei'Yrliet es un engendro herético, y, aun así, usted actúa como si tuviera cierta cercanía con los xenos... Esta perversión nacida del capricho, esta tolerancia fuera de lo normal... No lo entiendo. ¿Es obra de la Aeldari o es una falta de su propia alma?».

languages.text: 「ユリエットは異端の生みの親だというのに、まるで異種族と親しい中であるかのようにふるまわれた。気まぐれから生まれたこの倒錯、不自然な寛容…理解できませんでした。これはアエルダリの仕業なのなのですか？それともあなたの魂の欠点によるもの？」
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットは異端の生みの親だというのに、まるで異種族と親しい中であるかのようにふるまわれた。気まぐれから生まれたこの倒錯、不自然な寛容…理解できませんでした。これはアエルダリの仕業なのなのですか？それともあなたの魂の欠点によるもの？」

languages.text: “敌者伊莉耶特是异形的子嗣，但你的举动看起来与她很亲近……这种反常的行为与超乎寻常的宽容态度……我实在是无法理解。这是由于艾达灵族的阴谋诡计吗？还是源自你灵魂的缺陷？”
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

traits.locale_text: “敌者伊莉耶特是异形的子嗣，但你的举动看起来与她很亲近……这种反常的行为与超乎寻常的宽容态度……我实在是无法理解。这是由于艾达灵族的阴谋诡计吗？还是源自你灵魂的缺陷？”

languages.text: « Vil'Yrliet est une hérésie xénos, et pourtant, vous vous comportez comme si vous étiez intimement {mf|liés|liées}... Cette perversion née d'un caprice, cette tolérance contre nature... Je n'arrive pas à savoir si c'est le fait des manigances de l'Aeldari ou une faiblesse de votre âme ? »
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"

traits.locale_text: « Vil'Yrliet est une hérésie xénos, et pourtant, vous vous comportez comme si vous étiez intimement {mf|liés|liées}... Cette perversion née d'un caprice, cette tolérance contre nature... Je n'arrive pas à savoir si c'est le fait des manigances de l'Aeldari ou une faiblesse de votre âme ? »

languages.text: "Vil'Yrliet, kâfirliğin vücut bulmuş hâli. Yine de zenoyla yakınlık kurmuşsunuz gibi davranıyorsun... Hevesten doğan bu sapkınlık, bu tabiat dışı müsamaha... Aklım almıyor. Tüm bunlar Aeldari'nin işi mi yoksa ruhunun bir kusuru mu?"
languages.original_text: "Vil'Yrliet is a spawn of heresy, and yet you act as if you and the xenos are close... This perversion born of whim, this unnatural tolerance... I fail to understand — is it the Aeldari's doing, or a shortcoming of your own soul?"
